guide.title: Gentoo Brew
guide.abstract: The ultimate guide for beer-loving gentoonians.

body.p: Why not? A friendly talk on the #gentoo-doc irc channel showed me that the interest for beer is strong in the gentoonian communities, and I haven't heard many geeks who turned down a good beer.

So, this guide is made to make an ultimative guide for beer-loving gentoonians, where we can share our opponions on beers, and maybe even make our own gentoo-brau ;) Beware, that this document should keep the best beers tasted, since it is not interesting to know any bad stories ;)
